item.title: Quick terminal-based DNS switching
item.description: Motivation Most of us, at some point of our lives, have used at least a custom DNS servers configurations for our computers. Be it for avoiding censorship, faster browsing, security, or bypassing content restriction, we’ve all tried setting our DNS servers to some public DNS servers like one from Google (remember 8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4?). I myself is also no exception as I have been using 1.1.1.1 for privacy and speed.
